item.title: Digiscoping vs DSLR camera
item.description: Capturing information As a modern birder, good photos are central. Proof of identification is the difference between ecstacy and catastrophe. I recently got a new phone and I’m curious about its capabilities of taking good photos, both in terms of being able to capture useful information on a pixel level, but also in terms of taking aesthetic photos of birds and their surroundings. Some notes on editing All photos are shot in RAW format and are afterwards (subjectively) edited to look good.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.
